ps2.1:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
ps2.1:1.3_0: Tatra kho āyasmā ānando bhikkhū āmantesi—
ps2.1:1.5_0: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato ānandassa paccassosuṁ.
ps2.1:2.1_1: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā mama santike arahattappattaṁ byākaroti,
ps2.1:2.1_2: sabbaso catūhi maggehi etesaṁ vā aññatarena.
ps2.1:3.2_0: Tassa samathapubbaṅgamaṁ vipassanaṁ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati.
ps2.1:3.3_0: So taṁ maggaṁ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
ps2.1:3.4_0: Tassa taṁ maggaṁ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saññojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
ps2.1:4.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṁ samathaṁ bhāveti.
ps2.1:4.2_0: Tassa vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṁ samathaṁ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati.
ps2.1:4.3_0: So taṁ maggaṁ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
ps2.1:4.4_0: Tassa taṁ maggaṁ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saññojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
ps2.1:5.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu samathavipassanaṁ yuganaddhaṁ bhāveti.
ps2.1:5.2_0: Tassa samathavipassanaṁ yuganaddhaṁ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati.
ps2.1:5.3_0: So taṁ maggaṁ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
ps2.1:5.4_0: Tassa taṁ maggaṁ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saññojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
ps2.1:6.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhuno dhammuddhaccaviggahitaṁ mānasaṁ hoti;
ps2.1:6.2_0: hoti so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ taṁ cittaṁ ajjhattameva santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
ps2.1:6.4_0: So taṁ maggaṁ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
ps2.1:6.5_0: Tassa taṁ maggaṁ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saññojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
ps2.1:7.1_1: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā mama santike arahattappattaṁ byākaroti,
ps2.1:8.3_0: Tattha jāte dhamme aniccato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā,
ps2.1:10.1_0: **So taṁ maggaṁ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti āsevatī**ti kathaṁ āsevati?
ps2.1:13.1_0: **Tassa taṁ maggaṁ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saññojanāni pahīyanti anusayā byantīhontī**ti kathaṁ saññojanāni pahīyanti,
ps2.1:13.14_0: Arahattamaggena rūparāgo, arūparāgo, māno, uddhaccaṁ, avijjā—
ps2.1:14.3_0: paṭinissaggānupassī assāsavasena paṭinissaggānupassī passāsavasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi.
ps2.1:14.4_0: Tattha jāte dhamme aniccato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā,
ps2.1:15.2_0: Dassanaṭṭhena sammādiṭṭhi maggo sañjāyati, abhiniropanaṭṭhena sammāsaṅkappo maggo sañjāyati …pe…
ps2.1:16.1_0: **So taṁ maggaṁ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti āsevatī**ti kathaṁ āsevati?
ps2.1:17.1_0: **Tassa taṁ maggaṁ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saññojanāni pahīyanti,
ps2.1:17.14_0: Arahattamaggena rūparāgo, arūparāgo, māno, uddhaccaṁ, avijjā—
ps2.1:18.3_0: Tattha jātānaṁ dhammānañca vosaggārammaṇatā cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo.
ps2.1:18.4_0: Samādhi iti paṭhamaṁ vipassanā, pacchā samatho.
ps2.1:19.2_0: Tattha jātānaṁ dhammānañca vosaggārammaṇatā cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi.
ps2.1:20.6_0: jarāmaraṇaṁ aniccato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā, jarāmaraṇaṁ dukkhato …pe…
ps2.1:20.8_0: Tattha jātānaṁ dhammānañca vosaggārammaṇatā cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi.
ps2.1:21.3_0: Ārammaṇaṭṭhena gocaraṭṭhena pahānaṭṭhena pariccāgaṭṭhena vuṭṭhānaṭṭhena vivaṭṭanaṭṭhena santaṭṭhena paṇītaṭṭhena
ps2.1:21.3_1: vimuttaṭṭhena anāsavaṭṭhena taraṇaṭṭhena animittaṭṭhena appaṇihitaṭṭhena suññataṭṭhena ekarasaṭṭhena
ps2.1:22.2_0: Uddhaccaṁ pajahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi nirodhārammaṇo,
ps2.1:22.3_0: Iti ārammaṇaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṁ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:23.2_0: Uddhaccaṁ pajahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi nirodhagocaro,
ps2.1:23.3_0: Iti gocaraṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṁ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:24.2_0: Uddhaccasahagatakilese ca khandhe ca pajahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi nirodhagocaro,
ps2.1:24.2_1: avijjāsahagatakilese ca khandhe ca pajahato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:24.3_0: Iti pahānaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṁ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:25.2_0: Uddhaccasahagatakilese ca khandhe ca pariccajato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi nirodhagocaro,
ps2.1:25.2_1: avijjāsahagatakilese ca khandhe ca pariccajato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:25.3_0: Iti pariccāgaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṁ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:26.2_0: Uddhaccasahagatakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi nirodhagocaro,
ps2.1:26.2_1: avijjāsahagatakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhahato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:26.3_0: Iti vuṭṭhānaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṁ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:27.2_0: Uddhaccasahagatakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vivaṭṭato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi nirodhagocaro,
ps2.1:27.2_1: avijjāsahagatakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vivaṭṭato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:27.3_0: Iti vivaṭṭanaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṁ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:28.2_0: Uddhaccaṁ pajahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi santo honti nirodhagocaro,
ps2.1:28.2_1: avijjaṁ pajahato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā santā hoti nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:28.3_0: Iti santaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṁ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:29.2_0: Uddhaccaṁ pajahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi paṇīto hoti nirodhagocaro,
ps2.1:29.2_1: avijjaṁ pajahato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā paṇītā hoti nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:29.3_0: Iti paṇītaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṁ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:30.2_0: Uddhaccaṁ pajahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi kāmāsavā vimutto hoti nirodhagocaro,
ps2.1:30.2_1: avijjaṁ pajahato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā avijjāsavā vimuttā hoti nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:30.3_0: Iti rāgavirāgā cetovimutti avijjāvirāgā paññāvimutti vimuttaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti,
ps2.1:31.2_0: Uddhaccaṁ pajahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi kāmāsavena anāsavo hoti nirodhagocaro,
ps2.1:31.2_1: avijjaṁ pajahato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā avijjāsavena anāsavā hoti nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:31.3_0: Iti anāsavaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṁ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:32.2_0: Uddhaccasahagatakilese ca khandhe ca tarato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi nirodhagocaro,
ps2.1:32.2_1: avijjāsahagatakilese ca khandhe ca tarato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:32.3_0: Iti taraṇaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṁ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:33.2_0: Uddhaccaṁ pajahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi sabbanimittehi animitto hoti nirodhagocaro,
ps2.1:33.2_1: avijjaṁ pajahato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā sabbanimittehi animittā hoti nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:33.3_0: Iti animittaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṁ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:34.2_0: Uddhaccaṁ pajahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi sabbapaṇidhīhi appaṇihito hoti nirodhagocaro,
ps2.1:34.2_1: avijjaṁ pajahato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā sabbapaṇidhīhi appaṇihitā hoti nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:34.3_0: Iti appaṇihitaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṁ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:35.2_0: Uddhaccaṁ pajahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi sabbābhinivesehi suñño hoti nirodhagocaro,
ps2.1:35.2_1: avijjaṁ pajahato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā sabbābhinivesehi suññā hoti nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:35.3_0: Iti suññataṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṁ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:35.12_0: Imehi soḷasahi ākārehi samathavipassanaṁ yuganaddhaṁ bhāveti,
ps2.1:36.2_0: Aniccato manasikaroto obhāso uppajjati, obhāso dhammoti obhāsaṁ āvajjati, tato vikkhepo uddhaccaṁ.
ps2.1:36.3_0: Tena uddhaccena viggahitamānaso aniccato upaṭṭhānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti,
ps2.1:36.5_1: yaṁ taṁ cittaṁ ajjhattameva santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
ps2.1:36.7_0: evaṁ maggo sañjāyati, evaṁ saññojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
ps2.1:37.3_0: Tena uddhaccena viggahitamānaso aniccato upaṭṭhānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti,
ps2.1:37.5_1: yaṁ taṁ cittaṁ ajjhattameva santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
ps2.1:37.8_0: evaṁ maggo sañjāyati, evaṁ saññojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
ps2.1:39.17_0: So samayo, yaṁ taṁ cittaṁ ajjhattameva santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
ps2.1:44.3_0: Na ca vikkhipate cittaṁ na kilissati,
ps2.1:45.1_0: Imehi catūhi ṭhānehi cittassa saṅkhepavikkhepaviggahitaṁ dasa ṭhāne sampajānātīti.
